channel.title: CVE Feed for aimeos -- ai-client-html
channel.description: The latest CVEs for aimeos -- ai-client-html

item.title: CVE-2024-37296|2024-06-11T18:47:35.742Z -- aimeos -- ai-client-html
item.description: The Aimeos HTML client provides Aimeos HTML components for e-commerce projects. Starting in version 2020.04.1 and prior to versions 2020.10.27, 2021.10.21, 2022.10.12, 2023.10.14, and 2024.04.5, digital downloads sold in online shops can be downloaded without valid payment, e.g. if the payment didn't succeed. Versions 2020.10.27, 2021.10.21, 2022.10.12, 2023.10.14, and 2024.04.5 fix this issue.
